column5: http://www.ofah.org/news/bill-c19-passed  I guess they keep some promises.

Yea, I'm just hoping they keep their promise of transparency and accountability. Doesn't look good thus far, well, they've actually already broken that one numerous times. It was nice to see Trudeau trying to knock a little sense into them.
Does that mean I have to remove my bumper sticker? It matches my truck perfectly.
Nope, just add a check mark.
Great news. I've been following it hopefully on the CGN forum.  I wonder if rifle and shotgun sales will spike now.
Before there is too much back slapping better take a look at the new amo rules that are proposed.

Yay---to celebrate I'll starting learning to do with less now that pensions are kicked back to 67---oh wait---guess that was a promise they were just hidin from us??  Silly Us  and all the rest of the lovely Cons pkg tied to that gun registry abolishment
